meanings.definition: Pauls (noun): The plural form of the name Paul.
meanings.sent1: The classroom had many Pauls in it.
meanings.sent2: The Pauls were all excited for the party.
meanings.sent3: The Pauls in the park were playing happily.
meanings.sent4: The field of Pauls looked like a colorful garden.
meanings.sent5: Among the students, the Pauls stood out with their unique names.

meanings.definition: Pauls (verb): Third person singular present of the verb 'paul', meaning to make or decorate with a pattern of small dots or points.
meanings.sent1: She pauls her artwork with precision.
meanings.sent2: He pauls the fabric beautifully with intricate designs.
meanings.sent3: The artist pauls the canvas with care and creativity.
meanings.sent4: The night sky pauls the earth with twinkling stars.
meanings.sent5: The chef pauls the dessert with a drizzle of chocolate sauce.
